## DropModule.isV1() method

Check if contract is v1 or v2. If the contract doesn't have nextTokenIdToMint = v1 contract.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isV1(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;
